backend/main.mo: Actor defining user profile types, check-in data structures, authorization mixin usage, and brutal feedback message list.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report indicating a UI text update on the dashboard button and related metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain text mapping of frontend file paths to brief functional descriptions for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML document defining metadata, social tags, icons, and mounting point for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, actor initialization, status loading fallbacks, and routing to login, onboarding, or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendDial: Controlled dialog showing backend or fallback brutal feedback messages with UI actions.
frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendFeed: Card component fetching and displaying the latest brutal feedback with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/ChanceOfDrinking: Card showing a placeholder random drinking-risk level with colored styling.
Calculates days until Friday and the next full moon, producing themed messages and rendering them inside a card component.
frontend/src/components/DailyCheckInDial: Dialog for daily check‑ins capturing sobriety, drink count, and mood with validation and form reset behavior.
frontend/src/components/DataLoggedDialog: Simple confirmation dialog showing a message and icon after data is logged or updated.
frontend/src/components/DrinksChart.tsx: Renders a 14‑day drinks history bar chart, normalizing dates and animating updates when data changes.
frontend/src/components/FollowUpCheckInD: Follow‑up dialog asking if more drinks were consumed and optionally collecting an additional drink count.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Error boundary that catches component tree errors and shows a fallback UI with reload option and details.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header with branding and a logout button.
frontend/src/components/MoodIndicator.ts: Displays the most recent mood from progress metrics with an icon and color coding.
frontend/src/components/MotivationButton: Button that fetches a motivation message, tracks remaining clicks, and opens a dialog to display it.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingFlow.t: Multi-step onboarding form that collects user answers and submits a profile once all questions are completed.
frontend/src/components/ProgressStats.ts: Displays sober days, streak, tracked days, and drunk days from progress metrics with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/RepeatCheckInDia: Dialog prompting whether the user is still sober and, if not, asks for number of drinks before submitting.
frontend/src/components/SoberDaysSection: Shows current sober-day streak and a target comparison using styled cards.
frontend/src/components/StatusIndicators: Computes and displays today, yesterday, and weekly drinking status based on chart data.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedHeaderSec: Combined header showing brutal friend feedback and a motivation button with click limits and dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and auth-client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating onboarding, profile, and check-in data using the backend actor with retry logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a brutalist neon theme, base typography, layout fixes, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page that orchestrates user identity, profile data, check-in flows, dialogs, and metrics displays using multiple hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page showing branding and a button that triggers Internet Identity login with loading states and animations.
frontend/src/session/dailySessionFlow.ts: Implements a deterministic session-flow state machine controlling onboarding and daily check-in modal queues. Provides phase resolution, modal queue generation, state initialization, navigation, and message setters.
frontend/src/utils/sobrietyDuration.ts: Parses human-readable sobriety duration text into a numeric day count with simple pattern matching and a 30‑day fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear sensitive params from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, shadows, keyframes, and layout settings with custom theme variables for the app’s neon/brutalist design.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, and system capabilities for the sobriety‑tracking app’s React + Motoko architecture.
